dt: {bc}of, relating to, or situated at a sensory threshold {bc}barely perceptible or capable of eliciting a response
{bc}of, relating to, or being an intermediate state, phase, or condition {bc}{sx|in-between||}, {sx|transitional||}

dt.t: … in the {wi}liminal{/wi} state between life and death.

utxt.t: The market, standing between the sacred and secular, the mundane and exotic, and the local and global, has always been a place of {wi}liminality{/wi} …

shortdef: of, relating to, or situated at a sensory threshold : barely perceptible or capable of eliciting a response
of, relating to, or being an intermediate state, phase, or condition : in-between, transitional
